title: Microsoft Office ProPlus 2010 SP2 VL x64 en-US November 2015
description:
************************************************************
Microsoft Office ProPlus 2010 SP2 VL x64 en-US November 2015 
************************************************************

Supported OS: Windows Vista with SP1, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7 (64-bit)
Not supported OS: Windows Server 2003 64-bit and Windows XP 64-bit.

Release Info
------------

- Language: en-US
- Channel: Volume License
- Version: 14.0.7162.5000
- Format: DAA (ISO compressed)

Integrated updates 10/11/2015
-----------------------------

Definition Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB3101540)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB3085560)
Security Update for Microsoft InfoPath 2010 (KB2878230)
Security Update for Microsoft Publisher 2010 (KB2817478)
Security Update for Microsoft Word 2010 (KB2965313)
Security Update for Microsoft Access 2010 (KB3101544)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB3101521)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB2899516)
Security Update for Microsoft Visio 2010 (KB3101526)
Security Update for Microsoft Excel 2010 (KB3101543)
Security Update for Microsoft PowerPoint 2010 (KB3085594)
Security Update for Microsoft OneNote 2010 (KB3054978)
Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB2791057)
Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB2837592)
Update for Microsoft Outlook 2010 (KB3101535)

Installation
------------

If you have PowerIso installed, just convert DAA file to ISO format
If you don't: extract all files into the same folder and run the batch file Makeiso (this will convert the DAA file to ISO)

- Mount or burn ISO file and install Office
- Install Visual Studio for Office Runtime (KB3001652) (in add-ins folder)
- Activate using Microsoft Toolkit 2.5.3 (in add-ins folder, click the Office button, install AutoKMS, and click the Activate button)

Bonus (Add-ins folder)
----------------------

- Classic Menu for Office v5.85
- Office Tab v9.81

Please SEED for a while!
